data.title: Miami University Art Museum, Oxford
data.meta_description: Located close to Miami University, Miami University Art Museum was established in 1978. Designed by two talented contemporary artists, the facade of this museum is a preview of the visual treat that's to follow. The museum's 16,000 permanent exhibits and plethora of exhibitions makes it a must visit for art aficionados touring Oxford. Another striking feature of the place is their park exhibiting thought-provoking sculptures.
data.text: Monday to Friday 10:00 AM to 05:00 PM
